mapper.update: update pltf_user_group set name=#{name}, description=#{description}, scr_seq=#{sapConnResource.scrSeq}, date_format1=#{dateFormat1}, time_format1=#{timeFormat1}, date_format2=#{dateFormat2}, time_format2=#{timeFormat2}, country=#{country}, timezone=#{timezone}, lang_kind=#{langKind}, def_lang=#{defLang}, cp_seq=#{credentialsPolicy.cpSeq}, mod_username=#{modUsername}, mod_date=#{modDate} where ug_seq=#{ugSeq}

update pltf_user_group a set a.fg_delete='Y', a.mod_username=#{modUsername}, a.mod_date=#{modDate} where a.ug_seq=#{ugSeq} and not exists ( select 1 from pltf_user where fg_delete='N' and ug_seq=a.ug_seq )
mapper.select: select * from pltf_user_group where fg_delete='N' and ug_seq=#{ugSeq}
select * from pltf_user_group where fg_delete='N' and name=#{name}
select * from pltf_user_group where fg_delete='N' order by ug_seq
select count(u_seq) from pltf_user where fg_delete='N' and ug_seq=#{ugSeq}
